name: MySQL5

getPSDEDataQueryCodeConds.customCond: ( ( t1.`PRODUCT` = ${srfwebcontext('product','{"defname":"PRODUCT","dename":"ZT_BRANCH"}')}  OR  t1.`PRODUCT` = ${srfdatacontext('product','{"defname":"PRODUCT","dename":"ZT_BRANCH"}')}  OR  t1.`PRODUCT` = ${srfdatacontext('products','{"defname":"PRODUCT","dename":"ZT_BRANCH"}')}  or t1.`product` is null) )
getPSDEDataQueryCodeConds.name: 查询条件

queryCode: select t1.* from (select '0' as `DELETED`,0 as `ID`,'所有平台' AS `NAME`, -1000 as `order`, -1000 as `REALORDER`,(case when #{srf.webcontext.product} is not null then #{srf.webcontext.product} else #{srf.webcontext.products} end  ) as product from dual union all SELECT t1.`DELETED`, t1.`ID`, t1.`NAME`, t1.`ORDER`, t1.`order` as `REALORDER`,t1.`PRODUCT` FROM `zt_branch` t1) t1
